## Button
>des button通用组价

```
/**
 * 通用button
 * className
 * blue 深蓝
 * blue-light 浅蓝
 * danger 橙色
 */
export default class Button extends Component{
	render() {
		let { type="button",className="blue",styleCss={}} = this.props;

		return (
			<button
				style={styleCss}
				className={style[className]} 
				type={type}
	            onClick={this.props.onClick} 
				disabled={this.props.disabled}>
				
				{this.props.text}
			</button>
		);
	}
}

```
##params

`blue` 			深蓝

`blue-light` 	浅蓝

`danger` 		橙色
